Package it.polimi.ingsw.commons.message

package it.polimi.ingsw.commons.message
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.commons.message.play
     
  • Class
    Description
    ErrorMessage
    Message to notify an error to the user.
    GenericMessage
    Simple type of message that sends messages as a String.
    IllegalMessageException
    Exception thrown by those classes that manage messages and cannot run what they received.
    LobbyMessage
    This class manages all messages in the Lobby client server dialogue.
    LobbyMessageReader
    All LobbyMessage readers need to implement this interface.
    LoginMessage
    Class implements all messages used in the login phase of the communication between client and server, that that is from establishing connection and sending the name.
    Message
    Manages common traits of the messages between client and server and viceversa.
    MessageType
    Lists all particular types of message available.
    PingMessage
    Message used to keep the connection alive.
    PlayMessageReader
    Every class which "reads" play messages needs to implement this interface.
    PlayMessagesFabric
    Fabric class needed to build Play messages.
